item.title: Help with Tb Spell -
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

if (spell == 12445) {
if(playerLevel[6] >= 85)
{
startAnimation(1819);
castOnPlayer.TeleBlock = true;
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("A TeleBlock Has Bhen Casted

On You.");
castOnPlayer.stillgfx(345, absY, absX);
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;

	}
	else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
	{
	sendMessage("You need a magic level of 85

to cast this spell.");

	}
	}
